metadata.min_stack_comments: Breaking change at 8.8.0 for Microsoft 365 Integration.

author: Elastic
rule.description:
Identifies when a Microsoft 365 Mailbox is accessed by a ClientAppId that was observed for the fist time during the last
10 days.
false_positives: User using a new mail client.
rule.name: Suspicious Microsoft 365 Mail Access by ClientAppId
rule.note:
## Setup

The Office 365 Logs Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
rule.query: event.dataset:o365.audit and event.provider:Exchange and event.category:web and event.action:MailItemsAccessed and event.outcome:success
